title: What is Adobe Commerce Optimizer?
description: Learn how Adobe Commerce Optimizer lets you scale your catalog without re-platforming, ingest data from any source, define business catalog views and policies, and create a fast, performant storefront.

title: Merchandising rules
description: Learn how to create a set of rules that combine logic with actions to shape a shopper's search experience in your store. Use merchandising rules to boost, bury, pin, or hide products to calibrate search results in real time to support your business goals.

title: Introduction to Product Recommendations
description: Learn how you can use recommendations to increase conversions, boost revenue, and stimulate shopper engagement. Recommendations use artificial intelligence and machine-learning algorithms to perform a deep analysis of aggregated visitor data.

title: Overview of Adobe Commerce Optimizer
description: Adobe Commerce Optimizer enhances existing commerce platforms by providing a high-performance, headless storefront that boosts organic traffic and supports merchandiser tools like A/B testing.

title: Creating product image variations with Adobe Firefly
description: This journey covers the basics of Dynamic Media, how it works, what it can do for you, and what value it brings to your work and your customers.

title: Integrate Adobe Commerce and Adobe Journey Optimizer
description: Learn how you can use Data Connection in Adobe Commerce to unlock Commerce data and deliver end-to-end, personalized shopper experiences in real time with the help of Adobe Journey Optimizer.
